primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God (S) pursues and redeems a faithless, incompetent Israel (O) through a costly act of love that mirrors Hosea's redemption of Gomer.

tekstueel_bewijs: God's grace will seek after and redeem the beloved.
The God of Israel will save his people when they cannot save themselves.
I will woo her, I will go with her into the wilderness.

object.identificatie: The restoration of the relationship (Knowledge of God/Fidelity)
tekstueel_bewijs: I will wipe from her lips the very names of the Baʾalim
once more Israel comes to the knowledge and love of God
the unique majesty, holiness, and purity of YHWH
God’s faithfulness to Israel is stronger than her unfaithfulness
I did not come to invite virtuous people, but sinners

helper.identificatie: Hosea (as prophetic sign) and Judgment (as redemptive tool)
tekstueel_bewijs: Hosea shared... all the righteous wrath that God felt
the experience is redemptive: God cleanses Israel in the wilderness
Their misdeeds have barred their way back to their God
They would not listen; perhaps they could not.
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: Sin is described as an ontological 'wanton spirit' that makes the people incapable of returning on their own.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The hearer's response to the invitation of Christ (the 'virtuous' vs 'sinners' distinction).
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer
secundair_narratief_programma.object: True Knowledge of God (Mercy over Sacrifice)
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The secondary program is a call to recognize one's status as a 'sinner' (Receiver) rather than 'virtuous' (Subject).

voorbeelden_god_subject: God's grace will seek after and redeem the beloved.
God cleanses Israel in the wilderness.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: They ask advice from a block of wood.
They failed to recognize the presence of God.

voorbeelden: forbade his children to have other gods
The urge to make deals... was too powerful
my people are ruined for lack of knowledge
they got him all mixed up
They would not listen; perhaps they could not.
God will save his people when they cannot save themselves.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon centers on the human LACK of power (incompetence) and God's sovereign power to redeem regardless.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S1 (Covenant) to ~S1 (Adultery) to S2 (Judgment), then miraculously to ~S2 (Redemption) and back to S1.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Judgment is not the end but the 'wilderness' where Grace acts.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; judgment is described as 'clouds of doom' and 'bare as the wilderness'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon explicitly denies human ability to return to God, making God the sole initiator of the redemptive action.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: The God of Israel will save his people when they cannot save themselves.
Hosea is the first prophet of the unconditional love of God.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Hosea is not an example for us to follow, but a sign of what God is doing.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Hosea's action is a 'domestic drama' revealing God's character, not a command for husbands to marry adulteresses.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and awe; realization of own 'adultery' met by God's pursuit.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The narrative of Hosea/Gomer is perfectly mapped onto God/Israel and then Christ/Sinners.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: Endowment of 'Knowledge' through the wilderness experience.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Severe; sin is an addiction/bondage ('wanton spirit').

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a textbook example of grace-oriented preaching where God is the Subject and the human is the incompetent Receiver.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: The current balance serves the 'Amazing Grace' theme perfectly.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: Sin is already treated as a heavy opponent.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (God's pursuit) correctly precedes and enables Ethics (Knowledge of God).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterful homiletical movement that avoids the trap of exemplarism by keeping the focus on the divine Subject.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis would focus on the marriage metaphor's pathos, Greimas reveals that the metaphor functions to establish human total inability (incompetence).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains Hosea 3; semiotics explains why the sermon feels like 'Gospel' rather than 'Advice'.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas highlights that the 'wilderness' acts as a Helper to the Subject (God) by stripping the Object (Israel) of false helpers (Baal).

volledige_subject_lijst: Jesus (did not come to invite virtuous)
appendices.notities: The sermon successfully navigates the 'Subject-Check' by Fleming Rutledge.
